headline: Axon (AXON) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of self defense company AXON (NASDAQ:AXON) jumped 2.9% in the afternoon session after it announced a deal to acquire Prepared, an AI-powered emergency communications company.

raw.headline: Axon (AXON) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why

headline: Axon Therapies Raises $32M in Oversubscribed Series A to Transform Heart Failure Treatment
summary: Axon Therapies, a clinical-stage medical device company pioneering a new approach to treating heart failure, today announced the close of an oversubscribed $32 million Series A financing. The round was co-led by new investors Earlybird Venture Capital and Santé Ventures, with participation by existing investor Deerfield Management and new investors CD Capital and KOFA Healthcare.

headline: Axon Is Outgrowing Its Critics And That's Why It's A Clear Buy For Me
summary: Axon Enterprise's Q2 2025 revenue rose 33% YoY to $669 million, with SaaS revenue up 39% and management raising 2025 guidance to $2.65-$2.73 billion. Learn more about AXON stock here.

headline: 3 Nasdaq 100 Stocks with Promising Prospects
summary: The biggest names in tech, e-commerce, and digital transformation are in the Nasdaq 100 (^NDX), but only a few are leading the pack. Some companies in this index are proving their resilience and expanding their competitive advantages.
